message.content:
{"id": "24779", 
"title": "Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed", 
"description": "Bug 24779[Perspectives] Reference to invalid views are not removed. The plugin was not available the last time eclipse was closed, so the workbench should have no more reference on this plugin. It already tried, and it can't", 
"OB": "The bug report does not provide details of the undesired behavior.", 
"EB": "When the plugin is not available during Eclipse's closure, the workbench still retains references to the invalid views. These references should be removed.", 
"SR": "Ensure that when a plugin is not available during Eclipse's closure, the workbench removes any references to invalid views associated with that plugin."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
